text: __NOTOC__ The following lists events that happened during 1901 in Afghanistan. ==Incumbents== * Monarch – Abdur Rahman Khan (until October 1), Habibullah Khan (starting October 1) ==Events== *October 3 - The amir Abdor Rahman Khan dies at Kabul. His eldest son, Habibullah Khan, succeeds to the throne. ==References== Afghanistan Category:Years of the 20th century in Afghanistan Afghanistan
title: 1901 in Afghanistan
